page.title: 05Religion in Dalkeith
page.content:
There are 9 places of christian worship in the neighbourhood of Dalkeith. There are 4 churches belonging to the Presbyterian Church of Scotland: St John's, Newbattle, St Nicholas and St Nicholas Buccleuch. The latter 2 being served by one minister.
There is a baptist church and St Marys which belongs to the Episcopal Church of Scotland. In addition there is one Catholic Church, St Davids. The Christian Church Brethern meet in the Gospel Hall and finally there is a Mormon Church belonging to the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints.
The Presbyterian Church of Scotland and the Baptist Church provide opportunities for clubs to meet.
